name: PO Terms and Conditions
terms:
1) Each delivery should accompany:  i) Quality analysis report as mentioned above &  ii) Invoice & Weigh bill

2) Each delivery consignment should indicate date of manufacture, expiry and batch number.

3) Broken/punctured/torn bales found while unloading will be replaced by the vendor during the next delivery.

4) Bales with shooty mould (fungus) observed at farmers end should be replaced basis the image evidence.

5) Vendor shall address farmer complaints with regards to quality of silage material supplied within a week's time.

6) Rate mentioned is landed price at mentioned delivery Locations.

7) Unloading at delivery locations by Innoterra Platform Private Limited.

8) Payment terms: as per supplier agreed terms.
title: PO Terms and Conditions

name: SO Terms And Conditions
terms:
1) Qty will be delivered to the nearest bale number to match the required quantity.

2) Any revision in the price shall be intimated in advance and effective from the date of new SO.

3) Delivery Schedule: Minimum 20 days from the date of SO.

4) Delivery dates may vary as per the availability of raw material and transport facility.

5) Buyer shall arrange unloading of the material on his/her own cost at his/her storage facility.

6) In case payment is not made before the delivery, the entire quantity shall attract new rate as applicable for

silage sale on credit.

7) Credit facility is only for 30 days from the date of delivery.

8) Taxes as applicable from time to time.

9) Material once sold shall not be taken back. However, any damage in the bales found at the time of

unloading can be replaced in the next delivery.

10) Buyer shall arrange unloading on his own at the time of delivery.

11) Silage quality is strictly governed by the test report submitted by the manufacturer.
title: SO Terms And Conditions
